short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly Turn Youtube Tutorial Videos into Actionable Notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop pausing, rewinding, and scribbling notes – YT Notes captures it all, so you can focus on truly understanding the content. With auto-formatting and easy sharing options, getting the most from YouTube has never been easier.

Key Features:

•  Instant Notes: Convert YouTube tutorials into actionable, clear notes with a single click.
•  Free Daily Access: Generate notes for up to 5 videos per day at no cost!
•  Supports Long Videos: Works with videos up to 1 hour in length.
•  Auto-Formatted & Markdown Download: Get polished, downloadable notes in Markdown format.
•  Seamless Sharing: Share your notes with friends, study groups, or colleagues effortlessly.

How It Works:

Generate comprehensive YouTube notes in just three simple steps:
1. Navigate
    •  Go to any YouTube video and click on the YT Notes Chrome extension icon.

2. Fetch
    •  YT Notes will automatically retrieve the video transcript in seconds.
    •  The “Generate” button will remain disabled until the transcript is fully loaded.

3. Generate
    •  Once enabled, click “Generate”
    •  Notes will be ready in up to 30 seconds, depending on the video’s length.

With YT Notes, you’re one click away from perfectly organized, shareable notes every time.
